[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]nas kyang /_/bsod nams 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir/_/yon gyis bla ma mnyes par bya/_/de ltar rab tu gnas byas na/_/'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu/_/sems la gang ci 'dod pa yi/_/phun sum tshogs pa'i 'bras bu 'byung /_/rje btsun ma 'phags ma
[\[15a.2\]]sgrol ma mchog stsol ba zhes bya ba'i las kyi yan lag rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste dgu pa rdzogs so//_//rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub che dang dngos grub gzhan/_/ma smin pa las mi 'byung bas/_/de yi cho ga mdor bsdus pa/_/
[\[15a.3\]]snod dang ldan pa'i slob ma yis/_/maN+Dal dang sbyor gzhan dag gis/_/mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bla ma la/_/rdo rje slob dpon dgongs su gsol/_/bdag ni dus 'di nas bzung nas/_/snying po byang chub ma thob par/_/bla ma dam par gsol 'debs kyis/_/bdag gis bla ma mdzad du
[\[15a.4\]]gsol/_/ma brgal ba rnams bsgral ba dang /_/ma grol ba rnams dgrol ba dang /_/dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung dang /_/mya ngan ma 'das bzla ba'i phyir/_/bla mar zhu ba khyod spro'am/_/de nas maN+Dal sngon 'gro bas/_/bla ma sangs rgyas byang chub sems/_/'dod pa'i lha la
[\[15a.5\]]bdun rnam dag_/lam la gnas pa byas nas su/_/bgegs mthar byed kyi yang snying ni/_/de yis de la dbog par bya/_/bla ma lha yi sbyor ldan pas/_/mchod pa dang ni gtor ma yis/_/sa yi bdag po mnyes byas nas/_/snang dang mi snang sa bdag la/_/gsol ba gdab sogs
[\[15a.6\]]rgyas par bya/_/me long dbyibs can dkyil 'khor ni/_/'dab ma bzhi ldan pad+ma ste/_/kha dog gzhan dang 'dra ba'o/_/sa'am rin chen las byas pa'i/_/bum pa nyes pas ma gos pa/_/bsrung ba'i cho ga sngon 'gro bas/_/de dag steng du bkod byas nas/_/'bru dang spos dang snying po sman/_/
[\[15a.7\]]rin chen lnga dang ar+g+ha dang /_/mgul chings kha rgyan rdzogs par bya/_/de dag mi dmigs stong pa las/_/gzhal yas khang dbus ri rab steng /_/de dbus pad+ma'i gdan khri la/_/dam tshig 'khor lo bskyed pa nas/_/dbang gi bar du rdzogs byas nas/_/mchod yon sngon du 'gro ba yi/_/
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]mchod pas mchod nas rtsa ba'i sngags/_/'bum phrag gcig gis bsnyen pa bya/_/gsang sngags ye shes chu rgyun gyis/_/bum pa chos nyid gang byas nas/_/mchod dang gtor ma ci rigs bya/_/skad cig ma yi ting 'dzin gyis/_/mig tu ma dang Ta las ni/_/nyi ma zla ba gsal
[\[15b.2\]]byas te/_/bsnyen pa'i 'khor lo mkha' la bteg_/sngags 'di bzlas shing gsal bar bsgom/_/oM badzro tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/_de nas khro rgyal bdud rtsi 'khyil/_/bdag bskyed nas ni bgegs bskrad de/_/hUM lus ngag sems la gnas pa'i bgegs/_/'dir nyon nga ni dpal dang
[\[15b.3\]]ldan/_/bka' yi 'khor lo rab sbyor ba/_/nga yi bka' yi dam tshig las/_/su 'das brlag 'gyur the tshom med/_/mi dang mi min 'byung po'i tshogs/_/gdon gyi rigs su gtogs pa rnams/_/'di ru ma gnas gzhan du deng /_/bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags brjod cing /_/
[\[15b.4\]]khro bo'i gom stabs brgyad pa'i gar/_/rkang lag smin bskyod 'degs pa dang /_/zur mig nyi ma'i dbus gnas dang /_/'dzum bcas mche gtsigs phreng ba'i gar/_/bskor nas ra ba gur sogs bya/_/skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par las/_/
[\[15b.5\]]sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/_/lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/_/skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis/_/ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom ltar/_/de bzhin du ni bdud kyi sde/_/pham par byas te dkyil 'khor bri/_/lha yi nga rgyal ldan pa yis/_/thig le byas nas rdzas dgram dang /_/byin rlabs byas nas
[\[15b.6\]]rab bskor te/_/spos dril thogs nas 'di skad du/_/ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi/_/dpa' bo rnal 'byor dgongs su gsol/_/bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/_/bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor bri/_/deng 'dir thams cad kun gshegs te/_/dngos grub
[\[15b.7\]]'di ni stsal du gsol/_/stegs bu'i steng na gnas pa yis/_/phyogs bzhi nas ni gsol ba gdab/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/_/chos kun bdag med pa yi dngos/_/dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/_/mtshan rnams
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]thams cad yongs su rdzogs/_/mtshan min thams cad rnam par spangs/_/kun du bzang po sku yi mchog_/dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/_/zhi ba'i chos ni mchog las byung /_/ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyong ba/_/kun du bzang po gsung gi mchog_/_
[\[16a.2\]]dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/_/sems can kun gyi sems chen po/_/rang bzhin dag pas gos pa med/_/kun bzang thugs mchog kha lo sgyur/_/dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/_/thig le byas nas dkyil 'khor steng /_/ye shes 'khor lo gzhug byas nas/_/
[\[16a.3\]]dbang bskur bar gyi cho ga yang /_/byas la mchod pa dbul byas nas/_/byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa'i/_/bum pa'i cho ga rdzogs par bya/_/thig le re la re re ste/_/rdzas la bsang zhing gsol ba gdab/_/yol bas de bcad bdag nyid nang /_/khrus byas spyod lam mdzes pa
[\[16a.4\]]yis/_/dga' chen khyod la bdag dga'o/_/slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/_/byang chub chen po'i tshul brtan pas/_/mgon po chen po bdag la stsol/_/dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol/_/byang chub sems ni bdag la stsol/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang /_/skyabs
[\[16a.5\]]gsum dag ni bdag la stsol/_/thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/_/mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal/_/bu tshur theg pa chen po yi/_/gsang sngags tshul bzhin spyod pa dag_/khyod la yang dag bstan par bya/_/khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te/_/dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs
[\[16a.6\]]rgyas rnams/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/_/rdo rje gsang sngags 'di bsgoms pas/_/dpa' bo byang chub shing drung du/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan ma brnyes/_/gsang sngags spyod pa mnyam med de/_/shAkya seng ge skyob pa yis/_/bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa/_/dpung
[\[16a.7\]]dang bcas pa rab bcom ste/_/'jig rten rjes 'jug rtogs pa yis/_/'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das/_/de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/_/bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig_/de yi mdun du maN+Dal bya/_/slob ma mi dmigs stong pa las/_/'dod lha'i gnas gsum thig le
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]bya/_/rang gi gsum spros phyag mtshan no/_/slob ma'i mdun du maN+Dal rten/_/bsang gtor bya zhing mchod pa dbul/_/deng nas bzung nas bu khyod kyis/_/'khor ba'i nyes pa ma phog par/_/mchod pa kun dang ldan par ni/_/bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig_/de la maN+Dal dbul bar bya/_/
[\[16b.2\]]de yis so shing sor brgyad pa/_/yi ge bcu bzlas de la sbyin/_/bcad nas de der rtags shes bya/_/'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams/_/u dum+WA ra'i me tog bzhin/_/brgya lam na ni res 'ga' zhig_/'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung srid/_/gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung
[\[16b.3\]]ba/_/de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste/_/gang gis mnyam med sems can don/_/mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/_/bskal pa bye ba du ma ru/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_/'gro don mnyam med byed par 'gyur/_/gzhan yang theg pa chen po yi/_/lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang
[\[16b.4\]]ldan/_/khyed rnams der ni 'dod par nus/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'bras bu thob/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur/_/des na bu yis brtson par gyis/_/sngags sam srung skud 'khor lo yis/_/ku sha'i stan la byang shar du/_/yi ge drug bzlas nyal bar bya/_/skad cig
[\[16b.5\]]ma yi ting 'dzin gyis/_/cho ga sngar bzhin 'khor lo gdeg_/bzang po'i dris sbangs thig skud la/_/'od kyis ye shes der bstims nas/_/lha mo mdzes ldan slob mas drang /_/dza dza gsum brjod thig skud bsgyur/_/des kyang lan gsum brjod la blang /_/snying po lnga yis
[\[16b.6\]]gdab par bya/_/chos nyid rgyas btab tshon rtsi la/_/yi ge lnga po'i sa bon las/_/'od 'phros ye shes gzhug par bya/_/gzhal yas lte ba ser po la/_/gtso bo'i phyag mtshan dgod par bya/_/ze 'bru dmar po las skyes pa'i/_/sna tshogs pad+ma phyogs bzhi dang /_/mtshams
[\[16b.7\]]bzhir rigs kyi yab yum mo/_/mu khyud dmar la ral gri'i phreng /_/lha snam gru chad sgo rnams ni/_/phyogs mtshon dag tu shes par bya/_/sgo bzhir sgo ma dgod par bya/_/rgyan la sogs pa gzhan dang 'dra/_/phyogs skyong rnams dang bkra shis kyi/_/rtags kyang rab tu dgod
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]par bya/_/de nas rdo rje me ri ste/_/kun gyi phyi rol rgya mtsho'o/_/lha yi sbyor ldan bla ma yis/_/yi ge gnyis dang bsnol ma las/_/g.yo sdud sna tshogs rdo rje ste/_/lte bar gzhal yas rgyan gyis mdzes/_/dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma bskyed/_/rang nyid 'dod
[\[17a.2\]]lha'i thig le can/_/lan gsum du bskor bcu pa brjod/_/ting nge 'dzin gyis sgo dbye ste/_/gsang sngags 'di yang brjod par bya/_/oM badzra d+ha rod badzra sa ma ya swA hA/_steng dang phyogs bzhir legs brgyan nas/_/mchod pa la sogs dgod par bya/_/'dod yon bdud rtsir
[\[17a.3\]]skad cig mas/_/ye shes byin gyis brlab par bya/_/de nas sgrub thabs las gsungs ltar/_/bskyed pa'i rim pa rdzogs byas nas/_/mchod pa rnams kyis mchod par bya/_/brtan skyong rnams la gtor ma ste/_/phyi rol 'byung po rnams la sbyin/_/chos rnams gzugs
[\[17a.4\]]brnyan lta bu ste/_/dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med/_/gzung du med cing brjod du med/_/rgyu dang las las kun tu 'byung /_/de bzhin nyid las nges par skyes/_/bden pa de yis dkyil 'khor du/_/gzugs brnyan gsal bar slob ma ni/_/kun gyis dri ma med mthong shog_/_
[\[17a.5\]]de nas spyod mdzes khrus byas la/_/de la de yis 'di skad du/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/_/mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di/_/ma mthong snod dang mi ldan la/_/su la'ang ston par ma byed cig_/bdud rtsi lnga la byin brlabs pas/_/yi ge gsum brjod de la
[\[17a.6\]]sbyin/_/'di ni rdo rje dam tshig chu/_/srungs shig ma bsrungs sreg par byed/_/bsrungs na dngos grub ster bar byed/_/bdud rtsi 'di ni myang bar gyis/_/oM pany+tsa a mr-i ta u da ka Tha Tha Tha/_des ni de ltar byin gyis brlab/_/gdong g.yogs rdo rje dril bu gtad/_/rdo rje nas
[\[17a.7\]]gzung ha ha hI'i/_/sngags brjod bskor nas yol ba'i nang /_/phyag 'tshal lha la me tog gtor/_/gang la phog pa blta bar bya/_/dud btang thugs ka'i yi ge a/_/snying gar gzhug bya bde ba bsgom/_/rtags ldan brtan pa'i yan lag bya/_/de nas yum nyid de'i spyi
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]bor/_/spyan drangs sa bon yi ge ste/_/de las phyag mtshan bu gar zhugs/_/snying ga'i dbus su rje btsun no/_/oM tA re tut+tA re tu re tsit+ta maN+Dal badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM/_sangs rgyas kun dngos rje btsun ma/_/khyod kyi snying du yang dag zhugs/_/rtag tu yi dam lha gyis shig_/tshul 'di smra bar
[\[17b.2\]]ma byed cig_/gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/_/de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/_/nga ni 'phags ma sgrol ma ste/_/nga yis bsgo ba'i las nyon cig_/ma mos brnyas par ma byed cig_/gal te khyod kyis smras na ni/_/dam tshig 'di yis sreg par byed/_/tsha ba chen po'i gnas su sreg_/_
[\[17b.3\]]rang bzhin rnam dag bdag nyid lus/_/dpa' bo dang ni dpa' mo'i gnas/_/dri med rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ni/_/bu khyod kyis ni lta bar gyis/_/gdong g.yogs bkrol nas de bstan bya/_/bsam gyis mi khyab dam chos snod/_/dbang bskur dam pa mdzad du gsol/_/rnam
[\[17b.4\]]rgyal du ni bsdus pa'i chu/_/dam tshig ye shes las byung ba'i/_/rigs bdag cho ga rdzogs pa las/_/snga ma'i rang bzhin bsgyur byas nas/_/slob ma la ni dbang bskur ro/_/oM badzra a dar sha dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/_de ni mi bskyod par byas nas/_/mchod pa rnam lnga dbul bar bya/_/
[\[17b.5\]]'di ni chu yi dbang yin par/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyis gsungs/_/cod pan rdo rje dril bu dang /_/ming gi dbang ste bzhi po dang /_/gong ma gsum dang slob ma nyid/_/mi dmigs pa las de dag ni/_/AM dang dzrAM dang khaM dang AH/_/de las phyag mtshan yi ger bcas/_/de
[\[17b.6\]]las sangs rgyas bzhi bdag nyid/_/cho ga'i yan lag rdzogs par bya/_/mchod nas snga mar gyur pa yis/_/slob ma la ni dbang bskur nas/_/sangs rgyas tshul gyis de mchod bya/_/oM badzra sa mAn+ta dz+nyA na rat+na hUM/_a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/_oM badzra pra t+ya bek+Sha Na dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/_
[\[17b.7\]]oM kr-it+yA nuSh+TA na dz+nyAn badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/_oM tsakra amu ka dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/_bla mas spos dri sbyor ba yis/_/mchod bya yi ge bcu pa bzlas/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis byin brlabs pas/_/'di la 'go bar mdzad du gsol/_/sngags kyi dngos grub stsal du
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]gsol/_/me tog gtad la sngags bzlar gzhug_/de nas de yis de dag la/_/me tog phul la 'di skad ces/_/bcom ldan bdag gis bzung lags kyis/_/bdag la 'go bar mdzad du gsol/_/de yis de la rdo rje sbyin/_/oM badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM/_a
[\[18a.2\]]b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/_rgyan dang cha lugs kyis bskon te/_/lha yi nga rgyal ldan par bya/_/oM tA re tut+tA re tu re he he/_slob dpon nyid kyi cha lugs kyang /_/de la bskon la bsrung bar bya/_/oM badzra rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/_bu khyod 'khor lo'i dbang bskur gyis/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag
[\[18a.3\]]nyid yin/_/srid gsum ma lus sgrol mdzad ma/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i lung bstan to/_/khams gsum bdag por rgyal srid che/_/dpal ldan yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas/_/bdud kyi sde rnams bcom zin gyis/_/khyod ni grong khyer mchog tu zhugs/_/oM tA re tut+tA re tu re
[\[18a.4\]]sid+d+hi sa ma ya s+t+waM swa b+hA ba a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/_mtshan ma med par 'gro ba'i don/_/gang dag bdag gis byed nus pas/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur che/_/dpa' bo chen pos bdag la stsol/_/dkyil 'khor mchod nas khri yi khar/_/slob ma bzhag la dbang bskur bya/_/oM badzra a
[\[18a.5\]]b+hi She ka a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/_sgrar bcas glegs bam lag gtad de/_/chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur bya/_/de yis de yi snying ga ru/_/'khor lo bcug la ye shes bstim/_/dbang gi bar du rdzogs par bya/_/rnal 'byor de nyid shes pa yis/_/mi bya ba ni gang yang med/_/dpa' bo
[\[18a.6\]]chen po nga yi bkas/_/'dod yon lnga la spyad par bya/_/oM su pra tiSh+Tha swA hA/_rjes su gnang ba'i dbang bskur phyir/_/'di nas bzung nas bu khyod kyis/_/lus dang srog la mi phangs par/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_/'gro ba'i don ni dpag med byos/_/sems can
[\[18a.7\]]gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/_/rten cing 'brel ba'i chos dang ldan/_/khams gsum de ltar shes nas ni/_sems can don ni mtshungs med byos/_/de dag slob ma'i dbang bcu ste/_/phal cher bum pa la brten pas/_/bum pa'i dbang zhes brjod pa yin/_/phyir mi ldog dang
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]rjes su gnang /_/rdo rje slob dpon dbang yin no/_/nyon mongs dri ma 'khru ba dang /_/sa ni dang po thob par byed/_/de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur phyir/_/tshogs dang dpa' bo'i sbyor byas nas/_/mtshan nyid ldan pa'i shes rab ma/_/sta gon gnas byas bla ma'i mdun/_/dkyil 'khor
[\[18b.2\]]mchod pas mnyes byas nas/_/slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/_/gsang spyod thabs dang ldan pa yis/_/shes rab chen po'i snod gyur phyir/_/dbang bskur chen po mdzad du gsol/_/gsang spyod thabs dang ldan pa yis/_/shes rab bdud rtsi dri ma med/_/bdud rtsi chen
[\[18b.3\]]po myang bar gyis/_/dbang bskur 'di la khyod spro'am/_/slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/_/lha mo 'di ni khyad par can/_/yon tan mtha' yas ldan pa ste/_/gsang spyod thabs kyi sbyor ba las/_/gsang ba'i dbang bskur mdzad du gsol/_/gzhal yas nang du de bzhag
[\[18b.4\]]nas/_/'od kyis 'phags rnams spyi bor drangs/_/bu gar zhugs nas pad+mar zhugs/_/slob dpon nyid la'ang de bzhin no/_/mkha' gsang byin gyis brlabs nas su/_/gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba bya/_/yab yum 'khril ba'i rang bzhin las/_/ye shes gsal ba byang
[\[18b.5\]]chub sems/_/phab nas mtshan ldan blugs par bya/_/dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma kun gyi/_/dam tshig 'di ni ngo mtshar che/_/khams lnga yi ni ro yis gang /_/bde ba chen po myang bar gyis/_/slob ma'i lce la de bzhag nas/_/a ho su kha skal chen po/_/dngos grub dam pa gsal bar
[\[18b.6\]]mdzod/_/'das pa'i rdo rje 'chang sogs kyis/_/ji ltar sangs rgyas sras dbang bskur/_/byang chub sems ni yid 'ong bas/_/de bzhin bu khyod dbang bskur ro/_/'di ni gsang ba'i dbang yin te/_/sa bcu'i ye shes thob par byed/_/de nas shes rab ye shes dbang /_/shes
[\[18b.7\]]rab ma yi lus brgyan nas/_/lha mo 'di ni khyad par che/_/bde ba mtha' yas ster byed ma/_/blangs nas rnam pa thams cad du/_/bu yis bla med mchod par gyis/_/byang chub sems ni bla na med/_/bu yis de ring za nus sam/_/phyag rgya lnga las byung ba yi/_/rig ma dad pas
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]mchod nus sam/_/bshang gci khu ba rak+ta sogs/_/'di nyid du ni za nus sam/_/nga yi gsang ba'i pad+ma yis/_/bde ba'i myu gu skyed par byed/_/khyod kyis rtag tu mchod nus sam/_/ji skad bshad pa'i dam tshig rnams/_/lha mo ci phyir bdag mi nus/_/lha mo'i
[\[19a.2\]]pad+ma mchod par bgyi/_/thabs dang shes rab g.yas dang g.yon/_/de yis dar gyi mdud pa bya/_/dkyil 'khor phyi rol khri las bskyod/_/g.yon pas g.yon pa'i mkhal ma nas/_/g.yas pas gsang ba'i pad+ma ru/_/snying po btsal la rdo rje gzhug_/shes rab bum pa'i mgul chings
[\[19a.3\]]kyis/_/slob ma bum pa'i mgul pa bcing /_/bde ba kha sbyor bsgom par bya/_/bde gsal mi rtog ye shes skyes/_/rim gyis nyams su de blangs nas/_/dal bar ldang bya byang chub sems/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin phyir/_/lce yis bzhibs shing sems la bstim/_/gnyis med ye shes
[\[19a.4\]]gsal bar 'gyur/_/shes rab ma yi rkang pa g.yon/_/slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag nas ni/_/nga dang rdo rje slob dpon dang /_/mched dang lcam dral thams cad dang /_/khams gsum sems can ma lus la/_/ma mos brnyas par ma byed cig_/gzhan yang dam tshig bshad pa rnams/_/
[\[19a.5\]]rtag tu khyod kyis srung bar gyis/_/deng nas bzung nas bu khyod kyis/_/ji srid byang chub ma thob par/_/sems can kun gyi don rnams ni/_/rtag tu rmi lam bzhin du byos/_/'di ni shes rab ye shes kyi/_/dbang yin mi shes kun sel zhing /_/bde gshegs sku gsum thob byed par/_/
[\[19a.6\]]rdo rje 'chang gis yongs su gsungs/_/bzhi pa de nyid tshig gi dbang /_/bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya/_/rjes la bya ba'i cho ga yi/_/mchod sogs byas nas dkyil 'khor bsdu/_/yi ge brgya pas bskang bar bya/_/tshogs dang dpa' bo'i ston mo yis/_/mkha' 'gro ma sogs
[\[19a.7\]]mnyes par bya/_/de nas gzhan du gsungs pa yi/_/dam tshig rnams la bslab par bya/_/'phags ma sgrol ma mya ngan thams cad sel bar byed ma zhes bya ba'i las kyi yan lag dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste dgu pa rdzogs so//_//rje btsun ma 'phags ma
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rlan dang mi ldan pad+ma bzhin/_/gang gi dbang gis rgud pa yi/_/nyes pa bsal phyir pad+ma'am/_/bil ba'i 'bras bu de bzhin du/_/ka ra bI ra'i me tog la/_/me yi las ni rgyas par bya/_/yang na pa la sha yis so/_/gzhong bu gnyis sam bzhi yis so/_/bum pa bzang po lta
[\[19b.2\]]bu yi/_/snod chen nang du lnga tshan lnga/_/rin chen gyis bris snying po gzhug_/longs spyod phyir ni gter bzung ste/_/'bru dang rin chen phyugs longs spyod/_/zhing dang mdzod dang phyugs lhas su/_/go rims bzhin du shes par bya/_/des ni rnam thos bu bzhin 'gyur/_/oM tA re tut+tA re tu re dzaM b+he mo he
[\[19b.3\]]swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs shing phongs pa thams cad sel ma zhes bya ba'i las kyi yan lag longs spyod spel ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste bcu pa rdzogs so//_//rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dngos grub kun gyi rtsa ba ni/_/
[\[19b.4\]]mnyes las yin phyir de yi thabs/_/dus dang sa phyogs shis rnams su/_/sa yi cho ga legs byas par/_/khru gang phyed dang bzhi dpangs brtsigs/_/dri zhim dkar po byugs byas te/_/kha khyer ut+pal phreng bas bskor/_/dbus su sa bon yi ge'o/_/g.yas dang g.yon du
[\[19b.5\]]sreg rdzas dang /_/mchod pa'i rdzas rnams rim gyis dgod/_/ba lang gi'am 'o ma can/_/srog chags med pa'i bud shing ni/_/mar dang spra tshil la sogs pa'i/_/yam shing rnams ni sta gon bya/_/rin chen las byas khru gang ba/_/bzhi dang gnyis dang re re dang /_/gcig dang
[\[19b.6\]]phyed dang rdo rjes mtshan/_/dgang gzar blugs gzar rdo rje dril/_/rnal 'byor mdun du gzhag par bya/_/rdzas rnams byin gyis brlabs byas la/_/thab rtsig bsrung phyir ku sha dgram/_/rgyun gzhag pa'am bram ze'i me/_/bsags la rlung g.yab kyis sbar bya/_/'bar ba'i ched du
[\[19b.7\]]gsum gsum mo/_/thab khung bdag med chu skyes te/_/byin za zhal gcig phyag bzhi dkar/_/dbyug pa skyabs sbyin phreng gun+d+he/_/tshangs sku dar skyes gdan can no/_/me yi mtshams nas rang bzhin dgug_/bsang gtor dang ni zhabs bsil dang /_/mchod pa rnams kyis mchod
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]nas bstim/_/bsang gtor byas nas pad+ma yi/_/'dug stangs nang du lag gnyis so/_/bdun dang bdun gsum lan gsum du/_/mar gyi dgang blugs sbyin par bya/_/oM ag+na me A dI bya A dI bya/_a b+hi sa ma ya/_ma hA shrI ye ha bya ka bya/_bA hA nA ya swA hA/_
[\[20a.2\]]me yi mtshan ma legs brtags te/_/ngan na bgegs bskrad bzlog par bya/_/oM AHbig+h+nAn+ta kr-ita hUM phaT/_zhal dang phyag dang me 'od la/_/yam shing mar dang 'o ma zho/_/til la sogs pa rim pa bzhin/_/bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig dbul/_/oM a b+ha ba ga ag+na ye ma ma
[\[20a.3\]]shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/_de rjes dgang blugs byas nas ni/_/zhabs bsil sbyin la bstod pa dang /_/'dod pa'i don ni bslang bar bya/_/'bar ba'i rnam par gyur pa'am/_/de yi snying gar sa bon las/_/'dod pa'i lha ni skyed par byed/_/ye shes bkug la bsang gtor bya/_/zhal bsil ba
[\[20a.4\]]dang mchod byas nas/_/gnyis su med par bstim pa yi/_/ngag gi lam la hUM yig steng /_/me yi sa bon gyis mtshan ma/_/de la dgang blugs dbul bar bya/_/de nas rdzas rnams rim gyis dbul/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA ka ru Ni
[\[20a.5\]]kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM tA re tut+tA re tu re ma ma shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/_dgang blugs phul la bstod pa dang /_/bzod par gsol la 'dod pa bslang /_/ye shes gshegs la dam tshig bsdu/_/thab khung bsangs la me lha bskyed/_/dgang blugs sngon du 'gro ba yis/_/sreg rdzas lhag ma dbul bar bya/_/
[\[20a.6\]]dgang blugs byin nas bstod pa dang /_/bzod par gsol zhing 'dod pa bslang /_/ye shes me lha gshegs byas la/_/dam tshig thab tu mi dmigs so/_/yi ge brgya pas bskang byas nas/_/thab khung bsdus te dben pa dor/_/'di ni zhi ba'i cho ga ste/_/rgyas dang dgug dang mngon
[\[20a.7\]]spyod kyang /_/shugs kyis gnas par shes par bya/_/'dis ni mnyes par byed pa ste/_/sdig dang log 'dren zhi ba dang /_/dngos grub ma lus kun 'byung ba'i/_/phrin las thams cad mdzad par 'gyur/_/'phags ma sgrol ma bkra shis thams cad sbyin ma zhes bya ba'i las
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]kyi yan lag sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa rdzogs so//_//rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'bar ba'i me la sbrang ma ltar/_/gang gi stobs kyis gang ldog pa/_/gser mdog nor bu in+d+ra dang /_/sbur long 'phags pa rnams kyi gdung /_/
[\[20b.2\]]sa dang mkhris pa chu mu zi/_/'bras bu gsum dang b+h+ri ha ra/_/sbrang rtsi mar dang bdud rtsi lnga/_/dri lnga gu gul sogs sbyar spos/_/shin tu yun ring skyur dang mngar/_/mkhas pas ri lu legs byas la/_/rnal 'byor lha yi ting 'dzin gyis/_/spos des rab tu bdug byas na/_/rang bzhin
[\[20b.3\]]gyis sam sbad pa yi/_/gang dag dbang du byas rnams kyang /_/rnam par 'jig cing ltung 'gyur te/_/bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu po/_/klad pa rnams ni rab 'gas shing /_/lus kyang dum bu dum bu ste/_/mig ljongs yan lag nyams pa dang /_/rlung gis nags bzhin g.yo bar
[\[20b.4\]]'gyur/_/sdig pa la sogs srog chags dang /_/rims nad la sogs gnod gzhan yang /_/gang du dri 'di yod gyur der/_/nam yang gnas pa ma yin no/_/'di ni zhi bsrung skrod pa ste/_/gal te gsad par 'dod gyur na/_/drag po'i rdzas las byas pa yi/_/gzugs brnyan
[\[20b.5\]]la ni bdug pa dang /_/rtsub mo'i shing las byung ba'i mes/_/shes pa rten dang phral nas ni/_/ling+ga gtubs nas bsreg bya ste/_/gang yin ming smos de 'og tu/_/de la las sbyor byed pa yin/_/yi ge bris nas rab tu brtsam/_/bsnyen pa gsang sngags brgyad stong ste/_/las la
[\[20b.6\]]brgya dang brgyad du gsungs/_/oM tA re tut+tA re tu re badzra d+harmA d+hA hU/_/spo Ta ya b+hasmi ku ru hUM phaT swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma yongs su smin par byed pa zhes bya pa'i las kyi yan lag 'byung po bzlog pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol
[\[20b.7\]]ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rnal 'byor byang chub bsgrub pa la/_/'khor los bsrung ba'i thabs gsungs pa/_/shin tu dkar zhing 'jam pa yi/_/dar la dri zhim byug par bya/_/dbus su pad+ma'i ze 'bru la/_/oM dang swA hAs mtha' brten pa/_/'dab brgyad la ni lhag ma'o/_/de yi mtha'
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]yig rten 'brel can/_/de nas sna tshogs rdo rje ni/_/rigs lnga'i snying pos brgyan pa'o/_/A li kA li rim pa bzhin/_/mu khyud gnyis la dgod par bya/_/mthar byed sngags dang ral gri yi/_/ra ba phyi rol gnyis la dgod/_/de nas 'bar ba'i ra ba ste/_/rab tu
[\[21a.2\]]shis pa'i snag tshas bya/_/de nas ye shes 'khor lo dgug_/mchod cing cho ga'i yan lag rnams/_/rdzogs par byas la bsnyen pa bskyal/_/mi dmigs 'khor lo'i rang bzhin te/_/bar chad bsrung phyir gdags par bya/_/gang la bsrung ba 'dis brgyan pa/_/rdo rje rin
[\[21a.3\]]chen lta bu ste/_/de la bar chad gang gis kyang /_/nam yang tshugs pa ma yin no/_/'phags ma sgrol ma 'gugs pa'i khro mo zhes bya ba'i las kyi yan lag bsrung ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa rdzogs so//_//rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la
[\[21a.4\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/bgegs dang yams nad zhi ba dang /_/tshe dang bsod nams 'phel ba'i phyir/_/chu 'gram shing drung bzhi mdo'am/_/khang stong la sogs dben par bsdad/_/dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham par bya/_/sna tshogs pad+ma lnga yi dbus/_/nyes pas ma gos bum pa
[\[21a.5\]]bzang /_/cho ga ldan pas bcud rgyan bcas/_/phyi rol rdo rje'i ra bas mdzes/_/phyogs skyong 'jig rten dbang phyug dang /_/bkra shis rtags kyis mdzes par bya/_/sgo ni lho'am nub tu gdod/_/mda' dang me long ral gri dang /_/rma bya tshon skud dag kyang ste/_/gdugs dang bla re
[\[21a.6\]]ba dan dang /_/me tog phreng ba sogs dgram bya/_/mchod dang gtor ma rgya cher bsham/_/rje btsun ma yi rnal 'byor gyis/_/de las rin chen khang brtsegs te/_/nang du bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho'i steng /_/sa bon las ni bcom ldan ma/_/cho ga gsum gyis bskyed par bya/_/de
[\[21a.7\]]las ye shes sems dpa' gzhug_/mchod dang bstod pa byas nas ni/_/'dod pa'i don yang gsol ba btab/_/de nas lan grangs brgya stong snyed/_/bsnyen pa rdzogs byas g.yas skor byas/_/de nyid de la thim gyur te/_/de yi yid du mi 'ong ba/_/ba spu'i khung sogs las
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]'thon par/_/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis khrus byas te/_/rma byas byab cing bkra shis gdon/_/nad pa la ni logs su ste/_/gos bcas bkrus nas dor bar byas/_/lhag ma la ni lhar bskyed de/_/mchod dang bstod dang 'dod pa'i don/_/gsol ba btab la bzod par gsol/_/
[\[21b.2\]]de nas gshegs su gsol bar bya/_/'jig rten skyong sogs de bzhin no/_/de nas dkyil 'khor legs par bsdu/_/dben par dor la bskang ba bya/_/'dis ni bkra shis thams cad sbyin/_/yid du mi 'ong sel bar byed/_/gang yang mi 'byung med pa'i phyir/_/rnal 'byor pa
[\[21b.3\]]yis rtag tu bya/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_/bid+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_oM tA re tut+tA re tu re/_sarba gra he/_sarba byA d+hi/_sarba dz+wa re/_sarba bIr+ya/_sarba dur swAb ni b+h+yaHsarba pA paM pra sha ma na ye swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma
[\[21b.4\]]zhi ba chen mo zhes bya ba'i las kyi yan lag khrus kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa rdzogs so//_//rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'khor ba'i rtsa ba rmongs pa ste/_/de bsal bya phyir shes rab bskyed/_/thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin sku/_/gcig tu phan
[\[21b.5\]]mdzad dngos grub ste/_/ngag gi dbang phyug zhi phra ma/_/bdag bsam g.yas g.yon mdun rgyab tu/_/yid gzhungs dran pa shes rab dang /_/blo yi rang bzhin lha mo bzhi/_/snga ma lta bur bsgom par bya/_/srid pa'i 'khor lo zla ba'i dbus/_/rnam snang las byung dag rang
[\[21b.6\]]bzhin/_/rgyun mi 'chad 'byung de dbus gnas/_/mi smra'i sbyor bas gsang sngags bzlas/_/'o ma gser mdog tsha ba gsum/_/pad+ma shu dag rgyam tsha la/_/lan bdun bzlas pas bcom ldan 'grub/_/'o ma bre bzhi srang gcig sman/_/mar bre gang sbyar me la gdu/_/zla ba gcig
[\[21b.7\]]gis lan med cing /_/drug gis mngon sum mthong bar 'gyur/_/shu dag shing mngar sen+d+ha ba/_/gser mdog dong gra la la phud/_/zi ra ru rta pi pi ling /_/lan bdun bzlas nas zos gyur na/_/zla ba drug dang gsum dang gcig_/go rims bzhin du thos 'dzin cing /_/sa
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]bdag nyid dang blo ldan zhing /_/tshangs pa'i nga ro thob par 'gyur/_/gangs las skyes pa'i gser mdog dang /_/shu dag tho rangs lan bdun bzlas/_/zla ba gcig bsten de nyid du/_/bdag nyid yid gzhungs dbyangs snyan cing /_/shes rab ldan de zla drug gis/_/
[\[22a.2\]]ngag gi dbang phyug rang bzhin thob/_/oM tA re tut+tA re tu re hrI ma hA ma yaM ge ma hA swA ras t+yai nAM ma ma pra kr-i t+ya ba ri shud+d+ha sarba d+harma pra kr-i ta pa ri shud+d+ho\u0f85haM sa pa spya a pa yan+ta ra swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma chags pa thams cad 'joms ma zhes bya ba'i las kyi yan lag blo 'phel bar byed pa'i cho ga'i
[\[22a.3\]]le'u ste bco lnga pa rdzogs so//_//rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rnal 'byor bar chad bsrung ba'i phyir/_/dben pa'i phyogs su chag chag dang /_/maN+Dal gnyis dang mchod sogs gnyis/_/bsham bya rje btsun rten yang gzhag_/stan bde la
[\[22a.4\]]gnas sems can la/_/snying rje che bskyed 'di rnams ni/_/rje btsun gnas dgod dam bcas nas/_/de yi gtor ma gtang bar bya/_/de nas snying ga'i 'od zer gyis/_/thun mong khyad par spyan drangs te/_/mchod pa cha res mchod par bya/_/de nas bdag gi spyi bor a/_/de las
[\[22a.5\]]zla ba de steng tAM/_/gsum po yongs su gyur pa las/_/rje btsun zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/_/mi 'jigs ut+pal g.yas dang g.yon/_/sna tshogs rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan/_/mgul chings gdu bu do shal can/_/sku gsung thugs mtshan ye shes sems/_/skye mched rnam
[\[22a.6\]]dag dbu rgyan mdzes/_/phyag gi bdud rtsis bdag rgyas par/_/bsam zhing gsang sngags gdon par bya/_/phyi yi phyag rgya rdzas kyis bsdu/_/nang gi nang du bsdu bya'i tshe/_/bsgrub bya bsdus shing tshim par bsam/_/de nas gtor ma cig shos btang /_/'gro ba'i phyogs su bcom
[\[22a.7\]]ldan ma/_/zhal bzangs bdag la gzigs par bsam/_/de nas bstod dang bzlas pa bya/_/des ni 'jigs pa kun skyob 'gyur/_/oM na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM tA re tut+tA re tu re sarba duSh+TAn/_pra duSh+TAn ma
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]ma kr-i te/_dzaM b+ha ya/_staM b+ha ya/_mo ha ya/_ban+d+ha ya/_hUM hUM hUM/_phaT phaT phaT/_sarba duSh+TAn staM b+ha ni tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma bde ba thams cad bsgrub pa'i lam gyi yan lag chom rkun bcing ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste bcu drug pa rdzogs so//_//rje btsun ma 'phags ma
[\[22b.2\]]sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bag med la sogs mi rnams la/_/gdug pa'i yid ldan dud 'gro'i rigs/_/yid dang bltas dang 'tshe ba dang /_/rig pa'i sgo nas 'tshe bar byed/_/grog po phug dog mo yi sgor/_/lha khang 'dam rdzab mi sdug gzugs/_/ri gzar 'dzeg dang dud 'gros
[\[22b.3\]]'tshe/_/mtsho 'gram 'dug sogs gnod pa'i rtags/_/glu la dga' dang nub mo na/_/yan lag mi bde lus lci zhing /_/shu ba g.yan pa bas ldag dang /_/'brum bu la sogs thebs par 'gyur/_/mi dga' ba dang za 'phrug dang /_/sha mdog nyams dang me ris dang /_/res 'ga'
[\[22b.4\]]chu grang blugs bzhin dang /_/bas ldag sha bkra 'byung ba yin/_/sha 'phrig sbrid dang bems por 'dug_/mig ni tsha zhing zlum pa dang /_/smin ma la sogs byi 'gyur te/_/lag sor skam por gyur pa'o/_/lus la dri nga 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/chu bur dang ni nya lgang can/_/rnag
[\[22b.5\]]dang chu ser rul dri mnam/_/ro stod dag kyang zug par 'gyur/_/phyi yi sha skam mdog 'chor zhing /_/sha yi mdangs med zug dang bcas/_/gos kyang mdangs dang bral 'gyur te/_/glog pa char yag ma bzhin no/_/de dag bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir/_/lha yi sbyor bas gnas pa
[\[22b.6\]]yis/_/gu gul gla rtsi shu dag dang /_/ru rta btsan dug shing kun dang /_/da lis rnams la gsang sngags che/_/'bum phrag gsum bsnyen byas pa yis/_/de bsrung gla rtsi mi bskyod sbyor/_/gnas lngar byug cing bkru bar bya/_/'di ni sbyor ba zab mo ste/_/mi la ri dgas ji bzhin
[\[22b.7\]]du/_/gang la bsrung ba 'dis brgyan pa/_/de la sdang ldan 'bros par 'gyur/_/gnyis pa la ni shu dag dang /_/gla rtsi ru rta gu gul dang /_/mu zi ro ras rgya tshil dang /_/shi ba'i dri chen phag pa'i bcud/_/sgog skya dang ni ma du dang /_/mi yi bcud dang rus pa'i phye/_/mi bcud
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]kyis bsdus ri lu ste/_/snga ma nyis 'gyur bsnyen pa yis/_/dbang po'i sgo rnams bdug bya ste/_/nyi ma'i 'od la mun pa bzhin/_/dug can rnams ni nam du yang /_/'ong bar nus pa ma yin no/_/gsum pa la ni sum 'gyur te/_/gong ma'i rdzas kyi sbyor ba dang /_/
[\[23a.2\]]klu yi dug dang bdud rtsi bsten/_/'bar ba'i me yis nags tshal bzhin/_/des gzhan nad rnams 'tshig par 'gyur/_/bzhi pa la ni bya ba ste/_/gong ma'i rdzas kyi sbyor ba dang /_/klu yi dug dang rnam rgyal bsten/_/rtsa mig dag kyang bsal bar bya/_/nyi mas gangs bzhin de
[\[23a.3\]]'joms so/_/lnga pa la yang de bzhin te/_/khyad par du ni a ru ra/_/dri chu gla rtsi bsten par bya/_/rdo rje yis ni rin chen bzhin/_/thogs pa med par 'jig par 'gyur/_/oM tA re tut+tA re tu re ku ru kul+le/_sarba sha trUM bak+Sha ya bak+Sha ya/_hUM hUM nA ga staM b+ha ya/_mo ha ya/_
[\[23a.4\]]ban+d+ha ya/_yaM raM khaM suM ne ra la ne hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/_rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma rnam par rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i las kyi yan lag klu nad gso ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa rdzogs so//_//rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mi yi dbang
[\[23a.5\]]po la sogs pas/_/shin tu dam par bsdams pa rnams/_/rab tu thar bar bya ba'i phyir/_/ba lang lci bas dkyil 'khor bya/_/dbus su phyag mtshan sa bon bcas/_/de la de nyid spyan drangs la/_/mchod pa sngon du 'gro ba yis/_/dang po bsnyen pa rdzogs par bya/_/de nas
[\[23a.6\]]sbyor gzhan rab spangs te/_/bcom ldan mchod nas brgya phrag brgyad/_/gsol ba'i mchod pa dang bcas pas/_/legs par bzlas na grol bar 'gyur/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_mahA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_ri dzu
[\[23a.7\]]kad+harmi/_nir ya te/_tA re tA rA ya/_b+ha ga ba ti tut+tA re/_b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma/_mo tsa ne tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba'i las kyi yan lag khri mon las thar bar byed pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa rdzogs so//_//rje btsun ma 'phags
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang gis gang la rab bsngags pa/_/dngos grub de nyid bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/mig dang lce dang mkhris pa rnams/_/rin chen ga'u'i nang du gzhug_/bdud rtsi 'khyil pas bsrung byas nas/_/'grub par byed pa'i bsnyen pa brtsam/_/chog par
[\[23b.2\]]shes nas pad rtsar sba/_/dag pa'i mig las dben par 'gyur/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM tA re tA re tA ra dza yA/_dza ye dza ye/_tut+tA re dza ya/_b+ha ye tu re swA hA/_'phags
[\[23b.3\]]ma sgrol ma dngos grub thams cad ster bar byed ma zhes bya ba'i las kyi yan lag mi snang ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa rdzogs so//_//rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mthong ba'i chos la 'og min du/_/'phags rnams spyod yul dang gcig cing /_/
[\[23b.4\]]yid kyi shugs kyis skyong byed pa/_/zangs dang lcags dang gser dag las/_/'bar ba'i ral gri byas nas su/_/yu ba gzhung dang go rims bzhin/_/gnyis dang bcu gcig sor du ldan/_/A li kA li g.yas g.yon te/_/yi ge bcu pa dbus su'o/_/gnas skabs gsum du sku sogs
[\[23b.5\]]gsum/_/sgra dang me stag 'od 'phro ba/_/rab 'bring rtags dang ldan pa las/_/chags med yid kyis bskyod byas te/_/'dab gshog rgyas pa'i bya bzhin du/_/gang dang gang du bsam pa yi/_/zhing khams dag tu 'dod pa'i don/_/thams cad de yi dbang du gyur/_/oM tA re
[\[23b.6\]]tut+tA re tu re a mo g+ha sid+d+hi/_khang+ge pra srid d+hi/_lo ka A lo kA/_tiSh+Tha rat+na tsa la tsa la/_hUM hUM baM baM a ti swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i las kyi yan lag mchog bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa rdzogs so//_//rje btsun ma 'phags ma

[\[37a.1\]]g.yas dkar g.yon dmar khro gnyer dang ldan/_/dmar ba'i spyan gsum sdang mig rab bgrad/_/mi yi rgyu ma zhal du gsol ma/_/phyag 'tshal sbrul dang stag gi gos gsol/_/thod pa'i cod pan mgo bo'i do shal/_/ral gri dbyu gu lcags kyu
[\[37a.2\]]bsnams nas/_/g.yon pa mgo thod zhags pa 'dzin ma/_/phyag 'tshal dge legs zhi ba'i sgrol ma/_/pad+ma dkar po zla ba'i gdan la/_/rdo rje'i skyil krung zla ba'i mdog can/_/zhal gcig phyag drug sdig pa 'joms ma/_/phyag 'tshal don rtogs g.yas kyi dang po/_/
[\[37a.3\]]rgyal ba'i spyod yul thugs kar phreng 'dzin/_/gnyis pa na ni legs pa'i phyag rgya/_/gsum pa'i phyag gis dbyu gu 'dzin ma/_/phyag 'tshal g.yon gyi dang po pad+ma/_/gnyis pa na ni ril ba spyi blugs/_/gsum pa 'dab rgyas ut+pal steng du/_/'gro ba'i lam ston po
[\[37a.4\]]ti bsnams ma/_/phyag 'tshal chags pa 'joms pa'i sgrol ma/_/pad+ma dmar po nyi ma'i gdan la/_/spros med sems dpa'i skyil krung mdzes brjid/_/zhal gcig spyan gsum byi ru'i mdog can/_/phyag 'tshal hUM gi rig pa dang ldan/_/thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa'i
[\[37a.5\]]phyag gnyis/_/g.yas pas rtse gsum thugs kar bsnams nas/_/dgra yi lus la rab tu bsnun ma/_/phyag 'tshal g.yon pas sdigs mdzub rab 'phyar/_/snying po 'bras bur bcas pa'i shing 'dzin/_/thugs kyi snying po yi ge bcu pas/_/dgos pa'i dngos grub ma
[\[37a.6\]]lus 'byung ma/_/phyag 'tshal bde ba sgrub pa'i sgrol ma/_/pad+ma dkar po 'bar ba'i steng du/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyi ma'i gdan la/_/sems dpa'i skyil krung dpa' bar bzhugs ma/_/phyag 'tshal bde ba'i sku mdog dmar ser/_/zhal gcig phyag gnyis hUM gi phrin
[\[37a.7\]]las/_/'jig rten gsum po dbang du bsdus nas/_/bde ba thams cad grub par mdzad ma/_/phyag 'tshal thogs med nam mkha'i lus can/_/phyag gnyis thugs kar 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu bsnams nas/_/rin chen du ma'i rgyan gyis mdzes
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]ma/_/phyag 'tshal rnam par rgyal ba'i sgrol ma/_/pad+ma dkar po'i steng gi zla ba'i/_/dkyil 'khor dbus na 'dab bzangs ngang pa'i/_/steng du sems dpa'i skyil krung bzhugs ma/_/phyag 'tshal zag med bde chen rab rgyas/_/sku mdog dkar mo dung gi mdangs ldan/_/zhal gcig
[\[37b.2\]]phyag bzhi tA ra gnyis brjod/_/yi ge phaT kyis dug rnams sel ma/_/phyag 'tshal dga' ba'i phyag rgya dang ldan/_/phyag gnyis spyi bor lcags kyu rab 'dzin/_/g.yas 'og mchog sbyin g.yon gyi gnyis pa/_/ut+pal steng du po ti bsnams ma/_/phyag 'tshal sdug
[\[37b.3\]]bsngal sreg byed sgrol ma/_/pad dkar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus na/_/bde ba'i stan la sems dpa'i skyil krung /_/cung zad g.yas brkyang bar ni bzhugs ma/_/phyag 'tshal dkar mo dung gi mdangs ldan/_/sna tshogs dkar dmar 'od zer phreng bas/_/'gying bag
[\[37b.4\]]sku la rab tu brgyan nas/_/'gro ba'i nyon mongs ma lus sel ma/_/phyag 'tshal bden gnyis dag pa'i phyag rgya/_/phyag gnyis thugs kar me thab bsnams nas/_/sdug bsngal ma lus bsreg par mdzad cing /_/'gro rnams thar pa'i lam la 'god ma/_/phyag 'tshal
[\[37b.5\]]dngos grub 'byung ba'i sgrol ma/_/sku mdog dmar ser las kyi rigs mtshon/_/pad+ma dkar po steng gi zla ba'i/_/dkyil na sems dpa'i skyil krung bzhugs ma/_/phyag 'tshal dpal mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis/_/thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa'i phyag rgya/_/thugs kar
[\[37b.6\]]gser gyi bum pa bsnams ma/_/dngos grub ma lus par ni ster ma/_/phyag 'tshal bum pa bzang dang nor bu/_/'dod 'jo'i ba dang dpag bsam shing chen/_/khyod zhabs dran pas 'dod dgu 'byung 'gyur/_/gang la ci 'dod re ba skong ma/_/phyag 'tshal yongs su rdzogs
[\[37b.7\]]byed sgrol ma/_/ha las skyes pa'i khyu mchog steng du/_/pad+ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gdan la/_/phyed skyil rol pa'i 'dug stangs mdzes brjid/_/phyag 'tshal dkar mo zhal gcig spyan gsum/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gzigs ma/_/zhe sdang ma spangs gnas su
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]dag phyir/_/dur khrod stag gi sham thabs bcings ma/_/phyag 'tshal g.yas pas mu tig phreng 'dzin/_/thugs rje mi bzad rab tu khros pas/_/g.yon pa'i phyag na rtse gsum mdung thogs/_/dug gsum 'khor ba'i rgyu la bsnun ma/_/zla ba yar ngo'i tshes
[\[38a.2\]]brgyad dag la/_/gang gis rnam dag gtsug gi nor bu/_/bstod pa'i rgyal po gus pa'i blo yis/_/lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod na/_/rgyal po sbrul dang srin po mi rgod/_/me dang chu dang stag dang seng ge_/'jigs pa chen po brgyad las grol 'gyur/_/mu ge nad dang
[\[38a.3\]]'byung pos 'tshe ba/_/sdug bsngal yid mi bde las grol 'gyur/_/sdig pa chen po rnams dang skal ngan/_/'khrug dang 'thab rtsod nyes pa mi 'byung /_/nyon mongs mya ngan gdung ba rnams sel/_/sa 'og gter dang mig sman ri lu/_/rkang mgyogs la sogs dngos
[\[38a.4\]]grub brgyad thob/_/sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dbang phyug_/rdzu 'phrul kun 'gro gnas la sogs pa'i/_/dbang phyug las la dka' ba ma yin/_/bdag por byed dang dga' mgur bsgrub pa'i/_/'dod dgu 'byung ba'i dngos grub 'grub pa/_/de bzhin yon tan brgyad kyang
[\[38a.5\]]thob 'gyur/_/yid bzhin nor bu dpag bsam shing dang /_/dpal ldan 'dod 'jo'i ba dang bum mchog_/bde ba dang bcas nor rnams 'grub 'gyur/_/mtshan mo rgyu dang lto 'phye 'byung po/_/sha za'i tshogs kyis glags rnyed mi 'gyur/_/tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug chen
[\[38a.6\]]po/_/'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po rnams kyis/_/dgos pa'i don rnams 'grub par mdzad cing /_/bar du gcod pa rnams ni sel 'gyur/_/gang du tshe yi 'du byed btang dus/_/bde ba can gyi zhing du skye 'gyur/_/dngos grub 'byung gnas rje btsun sgrol ma'i/_/lha mchog
[\[38a.7\]]rnams la bdag gis bstod pas/_/dge ba dri med zla ba rgyas 'dra'i/_/'od ltar dkar ba thob pa des ni/_/'jig rten rtsod pa'i skyon bral rdzogs pa'i/_/sangs rgyas thob nas sems can rnams la/_/bde chen char pa 'bebs par shog cig_/sgrol ma mngon par 'byung
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]ba'i le'u bdun cu rtsa gnyis pa/_rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud kyi nang nas/_lha'i rnam grangs bstan pa'i le'u bcu gsum pa/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gsungs pa dang mthun par/_lha mo sgrol ma nyi shu rtsa gcig la bstod pa rnam dag gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba/_
[\[38b.2\]]slob dpon chen po sUr+ya gup+ta'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang /_bod kyi lo tsA ba rgya brtson 'grus seng ges mtho lding gser gyi lha khang du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab/_/[{D1690}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_
[\[38b.3\]]srag+d+ha ra sto tra/_bod skad du/_phreng ba 'dzin pa'i bstod pa/_'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nyi ma 'char ka'i snang ba ltar dmar lha mchog rnams kyi mgo yi gtsug gi nor bu'i dpal/_/phun sum tshogs pas dmar ba smug rtsi gsal po dngar bkod shin tu yun
[\[38b.4\]]rings ma lon 'dra'i/_/'phags ma khyod zhabs dag la thal sbyar cod pan gyis mnan yan lag mchog btud bdag gis ni/_/gus pas sgrol ma phongs skyabs bstod pa gser gyi me tog phreng ba rnams kyis mchod par bgyi/_/skad ngan ngu ba'i bzhin ldan rgal bar dka' ba'i
[\[38b.5\]]sdug bsngal me la lus dag rnam ltung ba/_/ci dang ci bya zhes rmongs lan gcig min pa'i rtsom pa byas kyang 'bras dang bral bas skyo/_/mkha' la nyi zla'i dpal ni gzhan las mang du thos nas blta bar re ba bcas gyur pa'i/_/mig nyams gzhan gyi 'gro ba lta bu bdag ni sdig
[\[38b.6\]]'joms khyed la gus pas rten par bgyid/_/khyed kyi thugs rje sems can rnams ni kun la bye brag med par 'jug pa ma lags sam/_/de dag gzung bas bdag 'dra yang ni de dag nang du gzung bar 'gyur la gdon mi za/_/mtha' dag 'gro ba'i sdig pa'i mun par tsha zer can
[\[38b.7\]]gzugs nus pa la yang do zla med/_/de lta mod kyi kye ma bdag smad nyes byas ngan pas brjid cing sdug bsngal ldan pa nyid/_/skal ba zhan pa bdag smad smad pa zhig ste nyin byed 'od zer gyis kyang mun pa sel/_/gangs can las byung 'jug ngogs chus dkrigs pa yi dum bu
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]'khyags shing bsil ba dag tu bsgom/_/rin chen gling gi lam srang dang ni nor bu'i phug yangs khang pa dag gi nang du dbul/_/'jig rten kun gyi yum gcig ma khyod mgon du byas kyang mgon ma mchis so bcom ldan ma/_/nu ma'i rgyu las lan mang dag tu

[\[39a.5\]]btang snyoms bya bar 'os pa min na yum gcig khyod kyis lta yang ci/_/gzhan dag rnams kyis mngon 'dod 'byor par 'dod pa khyed las thob pa rnams mthong bzhin/_/mi dge las byung nang gi gdung ba rgyun chags bzod blag med pas shin tu yang yang sreg_/gal te kho bo
[\[39a.6\]]sdig can lags na khyod la gus pa chen po 'di ni ci phyir 'phel/_/khyod nyid gcig pu'i mtshan gyis kyang ni thos dang dran pas 'phral la sdig pa sel bar byed/_/de lta na yang bdag gi bya ba'i khur dag dong ba ji ltar lags zhes bden gsungs pa/_/nad pa 'chi bar 'gyur
[\[39a.7\]]yang sman pa'i snying rje rgya chen phan pa khon par bgyid dam ci/_/sgyu mang ser sna nga rgyal phrag dog rang skyon tha chad rnams kyis dus mnyam rim par yang /_/du ma dag gi thun mong char gyur tshogs khang ja mo bzhin du bskor bar gyur pas na/_/khyed kyi zhabs pad mchod pa skad

[\[39b.1\]]cig tsam yang ma rnyed gang de'i don du khyad par las/_/phongs pas yi ge dman par tshig 'di bkod do bdag gi 'dod pa don med ma gyur cig_/dus mtha'i rlung rab 'khrugs pas dkrugs pa'i chu ni g.yo zhing 'gul ba'i rlung 'khor ral pa can/_/rab 'khrugs kun du bskyod

[\[39b.3\]]rab byung me stag mkha' khyim nang du rnam par rgyu/_/me dpung me lce 'phro zhing rab 'bar drag po'i khang par mal stan dag la rab 'khod pa/_/thal sbyar cod pan ldan pas khyed la btud byas ldab ldib dag tu gsol ba 'debs pa rnams/_/glog rab 'gyu ba'i rtse dga' rab 'bar chu 'dzin shugs

[\[39b.5\]]khyod rjes dran pa na/_/rtse mo che ldan mgo rtse'i rdzong la 'dug cing rab tu dga' bas 'chi bdag phyir zlog byed/_/mdung rings drag pos bsnun bsad mi yi mgo dang gsal shing dag gi 'khri shing dga' ston can/_/nags tshal stong par chom rkun lag rtses ral gri g.yo zhing brdeg par
[\[39b.6\]]gzas pas dregs rgyas pa/_/khro gnyer dang bcas smin 'khyog zur mig gis bltas mig can rnams ni khyed mtshan dpal gyi gzhi/_/gsal bar 'dri ba'i gnas la bsam pa'i smyu gu skyo med rnams kyis bran du bkol bar byed/_/rab rno sder mo'i rtse ni rdo rje lta bur bsnun pas
[\[39b.7\]]glang chen myos pa'i klad 'gems nas/_/khrag mang rab tu zags pas bkrus pa'i ral pa gsal po 'jigs rung ya ngas phrag pa khebs/_/khros te rgyang nas steng du 'phyong 'dod mche ba rnon po gtsigs pa'i kha can ri dgas dgra/_/khyod la 'os pa'i bstod pa don ldan tshig dag
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]bkod pas skrag ste log nas 'gro bar 'gyur/_/gdengs can rnam 'gyur du ba'i khyim dang mun pa'i dbyibs can gsal bar phud sgra dag gi tshogs/_/byed pa dang ldan kha gdangs ro 'dzin thag pa gshin rje'i zhags 'dra che zhing g.yo ba dag_/sdig pa las byung

[\[40a.3\]]sgra sgrogs bran khol rnams kyis rtsub mor smra byed zhags pa'i mdud pa dam pos bcings/_/bkres skom dag gis kha dang mgrin skams gang zhig 'phags ma sgrol ma'i zhabs la skyabs 'gro ba/_/de ni byams pa'i gnyen gyis spangs kyang mtha' med rgud pa de dag 'phral du gtong
[\[40a.4\]]bar 'gyur/_/sgyu ma 'phrul pa'i lam gyi rim pas rnam par 'gyur ba du ma dag gis chas byas shing /_/log pa'i gzugs tsam rjes su 'tsham pa'i mtshon cha'i 'od zer tshogs ni rab tu mi bzad ldan/_/mi ro las bton rgyu ma'i thag pa'i tshogs kyi phreng bas rnam par spras pa'i
[\[40a.5\]]srin po rnams/_/khyed rgyud las btus gsang sngags dran pas sdig pa phrogs pa'i srung ma gzhom med byed par 'gyur/_/glang chen sgra sgrogs char sprin lus can myos byed chu bo'i rgyun dang ldan pas mun gtibs shing /_/mtshon cha 'od zer rnams ni glog rab 'gyu ltar rab
[\[40a.6\]]gsal mda' yi char 'bab g.yul ngo 'gyed pa'i tshe/_/rnam par snang ba'i dgra bo dpung pa'i stobs ni rab mchog ldan pa rnams kyis bkag gyur pa/_/khyod kyi dgra bo gsod pa'i dpa' bo gcig gis 'phral du dgra yi sa gzhi phye mar rlog_/sdig spyod dag gi rjes 'brang phol
[\[40a.7\]]mig chabs can dag las rnag khrag rul pa rab 'dzag cing /_/sha lpags myags pa la chags rtsa yi sgo yi bu gar 'gul ba'i srog chags kyis zos lus zad rnams/_/khyod zhabs nye bar brten pa'i sman mchog ri lu gus shing chags pa yis/_/sa le sbram dang mtshungs
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]pa'i lus dang pad+ma dkar po ltar yangs mig dang ldan par 'gyur/_/gang gi rna ba'i snod na bla ma rnams kyis gnang ba'i man ngag slong mo mi gnas shing /_/thos pa'i nor dang bral bas mkhas pa'i tshogs rnams dag tu lkugs pa nyid du khas len gang /_/de yang khyed la gus pa'i nus

[\[40b.4\]]par 'gyur/_/g.yog dang las mtha' bzo dang dbang po gso ba'i thabs kyi rnam grangs dag gis rab skyo zhing /_/skye ba snga mar rab bsgrubs bsod nams bsags pa'i dge 'bras nor ni thob par ma gyur pa'i/_/nor med rnams kyis skye bo bkres pa'i yum gyur phongs las
[\[40b.5\]]'da' bar mdzad pa khyod la don/_/don du gnyer na slar yang gser gyi tshogs kyi gter dag sa las 'thon pa thob par 'gyur/_/'tsho ba chad las ngo tshar gyur cing gos zad chung ma dag gis rab tu spyo bar byed/_/bdag nyid gso phyir rang gi skye bo bu dang grogs po gnyen gyis ring du spangs
[\[40b.6\]]pa yis/_/khyed la rang gi sdug bsngal zhus pas rang gi khyim thab bud med gdu bu'i sil sil sgras/_/gnyid log sad par 'gyur zhing rta rmig rtse mos mtshams brkos khang khyim rnams kyi bdag po byed/_/'khor lo phyogs kyi 'khor lo la sbyor bud med mtshan brgyan 'od zer g.yo

[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]las 'gyur/_/tsan+dan chu yis dri zhim nor bu'i rdo la mdzes mas dus btab rtse dga' la chags pas/_/sdu gu ma yi bde ba'i nyer spyad mgron du bya ba mngon par gsang ba rab bsgrubs shing /_/ral gri 'od zer gyis sngo spom mtho dpung pa gtun shing dang 'dra dpung

[\[41a.3\]]chung sgra yis rjes 'brel rab tu gsal bar rkang gdub yid 'ong sgra snyan sgrogs par byed/_/'dod pas myos dga' gzhon nu ma rnams gus dang bcas par khyed mgon ldan pa don du gnyer/_/rdzing bu'i nang logs rin po ches spras gser gyi pad ldan ze'u 'bru rdo rje phreng ba can/_/
[\[41a.4\]]yongs 'du'i ljon pa las 'phro dri bzang dang ldan me tog rdul gyi bla re mthor bres te/_/pi wang gling bu sgrogs mkhas lha yi grong gi dga' ba rnams kyis snyan par rab bsgrags pa'i/_/dga' ba'i skyed tshal bgrod pa khyod la mchod pa bgyid pas yun ring nyams su myong bar 'gyur/_/
[\[41a.5\]]nang gi byed pa khyod la gtad pa'i bsod nams mthu ni rab 'bar yongs su smin pa yis/_/ga pur e la li shi shun pa a ka ru dang na la da phye'i dri ldan chu/_/'dod pa'i dregs pas rab 'bur bud med nu ma'i skyibs su rba rlabs 'khyil gnas dal 'bab pa/_/sman min chu yi

[\[41a.7\]]lus can bde sogs lag pa'i thag pa khyogs kyis rgyun du bskyil gyur pa/_/khyed kyi spyan ras phog pas dag byas lag pa rdo rje ldan pa'i lhas skyong byed/_/gtsug gi rin chen rgyan gyis mnan bzhugs bde bar gshegs pa nam mkha'i dpal 'byor bla re can/_/nyi ma
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]'char ka bye ba lta bur rab gsal 'od zer rgyas pas 'jig rten gsum 'gengs shing /_/brtan par g.yas brkyang zhabs gcig gis mnan khur gyis tshangs dbang drag po khyab 'jug rnams 'dud pa'i/_/khyed sku bsgoms pa skye ba la brten rnams kyis srid pa'i 'jigs pa

[\[126a.1\]]de bzhin/_/'chi ba'i mtshan nyid 'byung ba yin/_/rlung 'byung dbang las shes bya ba/_/de yan chad ni yod ma yin/_/'dir bshad pa/_dang po nyi ma phyed byas nyi ma rangs pa yang ni nyin mtshan dag gi bar du rgyu/_/de las zhag gnyis dang ni zhag gsum

[\[198b.1\]]gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni las la sbyor ba la 'jug par bya ste/_de yang ling+ga rgyu tshogs par byas la ling+ga sor brgyad pa'i tshad du byas la gtor ma'i nang du ldan par byas te dgug gzhug gi sbyor ba dang ldan par bya'o/_/bsgrub bya zhes bya ba ni snying gar pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad bsam par bya'o/_/
[\[198b.2\]]pad+ma'i 'dab ma rnams la sa bon dang lcags kyus mtshan zhes bya'o/_/gri gug hUM gis mtshan zhes bya ba ni pad+ma'i lte ba na gnas pa ste/_hUM la nang gi snying pos ldan pa'o/_/stobs zhes bya ba ni gtso bo dang bka' sdod kyi thugs ka nas nang gi snying po spros te bsgrub bya'i steng sgo
[\[198b.3\]]dang 'og sgo nas grangs mang du snying ga'i sngags bskul nas/_sngags kyi 'od zer gyis lus kyi rtsa thams cad mar me lta bur gyur te khrag 'phel ba'i phyir ro/_/bzhu nas zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi bdud rtsir gyur pa dang /_ye shes kyi bdud rtsi bkug ces bya ba'i
[\[198b.4\]]don to/_/sngags kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba ni thugs ka nas spros pa'i gri gug ces bya ba'i phyag mtshan gyis so/_/yang na zhes bya ba ni myur bar bsgrub pa'o/_/nag po'i thod pa zhes bya ba ni phyag mtshan gyi thod pa'o/_/bsgrub bya bkug nas zhes bya ba ni gtso bo dang
[\[198b.5\]]bka' sdod kyi thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis gsal bar bkug pa'o/_/khrag bskyed la zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya'i snying ga'i 'od zer gyis khrag bskyed pa dang phyag mtshan gyi gri gug gis gtubs nas khrag 'thung ba'i phyir ro/_/khrag 'dzag ces bya ba ni gdug pa sgrol ba la
[\[198b.6\]]chags pa'i phyir khrag 'dzag ces bya'o/_/rgyun mi 'chad ces bya ba ni zas kyi rnal 'byor gyi dus su yang de ltar bya ba'i phyir ro/_/dngos grub nges pa zhi zhes bya ba ni bsnyen pa dang las sbyor thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba'i phyir ro/_/bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni gtor ma'i cho ga
[\[198b.7\]]sdud pa pos bsdus te 'khor la bshad pa'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi le'u zhes bya ba ni bzhi pa'i don to/_/slob ma dkyil 'khor du smin par bya ba dang /_dkyil 'khor la sogs te rten sgrub pa'i don ston pa'i le'u'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi le'u'i bshad pa ste bzhi pa'o//_//_
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]de ltar bsnyen pa'i yan lag thams cad dang ldan pas sbyor ka chen po la 'jug pa'i phyir/_de nas zhes bya ba ni de yang mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho las gsungs pa/_sngags ni lha yi sa bon te/_/lha yi bdag nyid rdzogs pa nyid/_/dkyil 'khor rab gnas bdag nyid do/_/de
[\[199a.2\]]ltar bsnyen pa rdzogs nas ni/_/sbyor ka chen po rdzogs par 'gyur/_/bsnyen pa'i yan lag ma tshang bar/_/las la sbyor bar byed pa ni/_/dam tshig nyams shing 'jig rten 'phya/_/zhes 'byung /_dpal nag po chen po dang mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs rnams zhes bya ba ni khyad par gyi sbyor ka yin
[\[199a.3\]]pa dang /_tshogs kyi 'khor lo thams cad kyi las bsgrub pa'i phyir gtso bo la zhugs pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni zhus pa'i tshig ste go sla'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to/_/zhes bya ba nas bstan pa srung bar khas blangs zhes bya ba 'khor rnams la dam tshig gi khyad par gyis
[\[199a.4\]]bka' bsgos pa ste go sla'o/_/bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni gong du bstan pa'i don bsdus nas 'khor la bshad pa'o/_/nag po chen pos gsol pa zhes bya ba ni par pu'i sbyor ka gtso bo la zhus pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/zhes bya ba ni mdor bsdus te bshad pa'o/_/
[\[199a.5\]]rnam pa bzhis zhes bya ba ni yan lag bzhi pas 'grub kyi gzhan gyis ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni bzhi'i don mdor bsdus te 'khor la bshad pa'o/_/de nas gsol ba zhes bya ba ni bzhi'i don bye brag tu zhus pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/zhes bya ba
[\[199a.6\]]ni par pu'i gnas mdor bsdus te bstan pa'o/_/bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni bsdus te 'khor la bshad pa'o/_/de nas zhes bya ba ni gnas bsgrub pa zhes pa ste/_rngam pa'i zhal dang 'jigs pa'i sku/_/zhes bya ba ni drag po'i bzlas pa dang lha'i 'khor los gnas bsgrub pa bstan pa'o/_/bcom
[\[199a.7\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/zhes bya ba ni gnas kyi 'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin la zhus pa'o/_/dur khrod kyi pha gu zhes bya ba ni dur khrod kyis las pha gu byas nas ro bsregs kyi mgal pas bsregs pa nyid do/_/dpa' bo'i keng rus zhes bya ba ni g.yul du bsad pa'i gri rus so/_/sgrub pa'i khang bu
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]zur gsum bya/_/zhes bya ba ni grong khyer sum brtsegs dang mthun pa ste rtse gsum par bya'o/_/brtsegs bar ma g.yul 'gyed pa'i sa ste bsgrub par bya'o/_/zur gsum ni me'i dbyibs su bya'o/_/thod pa'i nang du 'khor lo bri/_/zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo ni dur khrod kyi snag tshas bri bar bya ste/_de
[\[199b.2\]]yang /_bdud rtsis maN+Dal byas nas ni/_/lha yi rnal 'byor rab gsal ba/_/lho phyogs su ni mngon phyogs te/_/dur khrod sol bas 'khor lo bri/_/'khor lo me yi dkyil 'khor la/_/sna bzhi sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan/_/dbus su nang gi snying po bri/_/ri pha gsum gyis mtshan par bri/_/
[\[199b.3\]]bar khyams gsum gyi nang du yang /_/yi ge oM gyi dang po dang /_/hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA'i mtha' can ni/_/me gnyis kyi ni nang du bri/_/rdo rje'i ra ni dbus ma la/_/hUM ni drag po bri bar bya/_/'khor lo maN+Dal steng bzhag nas/_/gtso bo'i thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis/_/'khor lo rang bzhin med
[\[199b.4\]]par bya/_/me yi sa bon las skyes pa'i/_/'khor lo me yi dkyil 'khor mtshungs/_/gtso bo'i thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis/_/lha yi 'khor lo spyan drangs te/_/yan lag cho ga kun byas nas/_/'khor lo la ni bstim par byas/_/khang pa'i nang gi zur du gzhug_/ces bya ba la sogs
[\[199b.5\]]pa ni go sla'o/_/dus gsum du zhes bya ba ni ji srid khang pa ma tshar gyi bar du'o/_/the tshom med pa ni nges par 'grub pa'i phyir ro/_/bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni sdud pa pos gnas kyi don bsdus te 'khor la bshad pa'o/_/de nas nag po chen pos gsol pa zhes bya ba ni par pu'i cho ga las
[\[199b.6\]]zhus pa ste go sla'o/_/bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni par pu bsgrub pa'i don mdor bsdus te bstan pa'o/_/gsum zhes bya ba ni bsgrub pa'i don gsum dang ldan pa 'grub par 'gyur gyi/_mi ldan pas ni mi 'grub pa'i phyir shes par gyis zhes bya'o/_/bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni par bu'i don mdor
[\[199b.7\]]bsdus te bstan pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba zhes bya ba ni gtso bo la par bu'i don rgyas par zhus pa'o/_/bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das drag po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug ces bya ba'i don to/_/dkyil 'khor dang ni par bu'i rgyu/_/zhes bya ba la
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]sogs pa ni go sla'o/_/chu 'gram zhes bya ba ni grog mkhar gyi sa'o/_/steng du zhing gi bla re bkod/_/ces bya ba ni dur khrod ras la 'khor lo byas te/_de yang lho phyogs su ni kha bstan te/_/bdud rtsis maN+Dal byas nas ni/_/de ni 'khor lo bri bar bya/_/bya rog 'ug pa'i
[\[200a.2\]]khrag gis ni/_/'khor lo gru bzhir byas pa la/_/sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa ste/_/phyi rol mu khyud zlum por bya/_/dbus su nang gi snying po ni/_/phyogs bzhi rnams su legs par bri/_/shar la sogs pa'i bar khyams la/_/oM ma hA kA la ya/_phur pa 'dis ban+d+ha la sogs pa'i/_/
[\[200a.3\]]sngags ni legs par bri bar bya/_/rdo rje'i ra ni dbus ma la/_/badzra ban+d+ha bri ba ni/_/hUM gnyis kyi ni bar du gzhag_/rdo rje ra gzhan mtshams su ni/_/drag po'i hUM ni dgod par bya/_/phyi rol 'khor lo'i mu khyud la/_/rtsa ba'i sngags ni legs par bri/_/'khor lo maN+Dal steng bzhag la/_/
[\[200a.4\]]gtso bo'i thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis/_/'khor lo rang bzhin med byas la/_/laM las byung ba'i 'khor lo ni/_/kha dog ser po gru bzhi ste/_/rdo rje brag gis mtshan pa la/_/sngags ni mar me'i me ltar 'bar/_/de nas thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis/_/bka' yi 'khor lo spyan drangs te/_/yan
[\[200a.5\]]lag cho ga kun byas nas/_/'khor lo la ni bstim par bya/_/de nas gtso bo'i thugs ka nas/_/nang gi snying po rab spros te/_/'khor lo stong phrag bstim par bya/_/'khor lo'i zur la zhes bya ba ni go sla'o/_/thod pa dum bu gcig par ni/_/zhes bya ba ni bsten par bya ba'i gtor ma'o/_/
[\[200a.6\]]nub byang dkyil 'khor zur la ni/_/zhes bya ba ni rab gnas byas pa'i phyag mtshan no/_/thod pa khrag gis bkang zhes bya ba ni nag po gsum gyi khrag ste ming gi yi ge dang ldan par bya'o/_/bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni par bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi don bsdus te bshad pa'o/_/gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni
[\[200a.7\]]par bu'i rgyu bsgrub pa la 'jug pa'o/_/mchod pa yis zhes bya ba ni gcan gzan gyis brkos pa'i mchod pa'i sa'o/_/sreg pa'i skra ni lho phyogs su mgo bstan nas shi ba'i skra'o/_/par bu zhes bya ba ni nag po'i tshes gcig la lha'i sbyor ba dang ldan par bya'o/_/tsha zhing kha ba'i me yis bsreg_/_
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]ces bya ba ni dur khrod kyi mgal dum dang ldan pas bsgrub bya'i pha mes kyi ro bsregs pa'i sar bsreg par bya'o/_/'khor lo bris la zhes bya ba ni/_phyi rol zur gsum 'bar bar bya/_/dbus su mu khyud bzhis bskor te/_/phyi rol zur gsum dag tu ni/_/rdo rje 'bar ba bri bar bya/_/dbus su nang gi snying
[\[200b.2\]]po ni/_/bsgrub bya'i ming dang ldan par bri/_/phyi rol gyi ni mu khyud la/_/phyi yi snying po bri bar bya/_/de yi phyi rol mu khyud ni/_/ling tshe brgyad du gnas pa la/_/'khor lo'i sngags su bkod pa ni/_/sde tshan brgyad du rab phye ste/_/hUM gi bar du bri bar bya/_/phyi rol mu khyud brgyad la ni/_/rtsa ba'i sngags ni
[\[200b.3\]]dgod par bya/_/de yi phyi rol mu khyud la/_/las kyi sngags ni dgod par bya/_/phyi rol rdo rje snying po la/_/nang gi snying po bri bar bya/_/de nas rdo rje rtse gzhan la/_/drag po'i hUM ni bri bar bya/_/phyi rol zur gsum bar khyams la/_/gsang ba'i sngags ni dgod par bya/_/yi ge dgod ces bya ba ni/_/
[\[200b.4\]]lugs dang lugs min gnyis su dgod/_/gsang ba'i sngags ni bri ba ni/_/'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bri bar bya/_/lte bar me yi dkyil 'khor bri/_/me yi dbus su nang gi ni/_/snying po'i ming dang bcas pa dgod/_/phyi rol zla gam gsum la ni/_/phyi yi snying po dgod par bya/_/'khor lo'i
[\[200b.5\]]rtsibs ni thams cad la/_/rtsa ba'i sngags ni dgod pa ste/_/sde tshan brgyad du dbye bar bya/_/bar du bsgrub pa'i ming yig gzhug_/phyi rol 'khor lo'i mu khyud la/_/gsang ba'i sngags ni bri bar bya/_/de yang g.yas skor g.yon skor du/_/'khor lo gnyis ni bri bar bya/_/stobs kyi par
[\[200b.6\]]bu zhes bya ni/_/phyag mtshan gnyis ni bkod pa ste/_/steng dang 'og tu yang dag gnas/_/ling+ga cho gas gzhug par bya/_/zhes bya ba ni yid 'phrog ma la sogs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma dgu sta gon la gnas par bya'o/_/lho nub tu kha bltas te zhes bya ba ni/_'khor lo bri ba'i dus su'o/_/ling+ga ming gi
[\[200b.7\]]yi ge zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o/_/bum par 'khor lo gzhug par bya/_/zhes bya ba ni phyir mi ldog pa'i cho ga ste srung ba'i 'khor lo'o zhes bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni par bu bca' ba'i rim pa bsdus te bstan pa'o/_/de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/_/zhes bya ba ni sku'i cho ga la
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]'jug par bya ste/_dkyil 'khor gyi le'ur bstan zin to/_/zhing gi steng du bzhugs su gsol/_/zhes bya ba ni mdun bskyed kyi cho ga rdzogs par bya'o zhes pa'i ston to/_/de yang rgyun du zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor pas nye bar bsgrub pa'i bsnyen pa bskyal ba'o/_/mthun pa'i dam rdzas
[\[201a.2\]]zhes bya ba la sogs pa go sla'o/_/sku'i cho ga zhes bya ba ni rgyud du gsungs pa'i par bu'i cho ga ma rdzogs bar du cho gar byas pa'i phyir ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to/_/zhes bya ba ni sku'i cho ga gsungs te bshad pa'o/_/de nas gsol pa zhes bya ba ni par bu bsgrub par bya ba'i don
[\[201a.3\]]du zhus pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/zhes bya ba ni sku'i nye bar bsgrub pa'i bsnyen pa rgyas par bshad pa'o/_/par bu sgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o/_/bsam gtan zhes bya ba ni thugs ka'i gri gug la gnas pa'i hUM las
[\[201a.4\]]'od zer gri gug lta bu spros te gur dang ra ba la sogs par gyur pa'o/_/sngags zhes bya ba ni badzra ka pa rtsa'i sngags kyis so/_/mtshams bcad ces bya ba ni srung ba'i 'khor lo bya ba'i phyir ro/_/mchod pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o/_/mdun gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mdun du bskyed pa'i cho
[\[201a.5\]]ga rgyas par bshad pa'o/_/sngags kyi phreng ba zhes bya ba ni thugs kar gnas pa'o/_/drag po'i stobs zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi 'od zer gyi gri gug gi phreng bar spro ba'o/_/bsam gtan zhes bya ba ni gtso bo dang bka' sdod kyi bar du bsgrub bya dmigs la/_bsgrub bya'i gnas gsum du
[\[201a.6\]]rnam shes kyi yi ge bsam pa'o/_/sngags kyi bzlas pa zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi 'od zer gyis bsgrub bya'i rlung sgor zhugs te/_yi ge gsum tshangs pa'i bu ga nas phyung nas par bu nag po chen po la bstims pa'am/_zhal nas zhal du 'khor ba'i phyir bzlas pa bya zhes bya'o/_/dus gsum
[\[201a.7\]]rgyu zhes bya ba ni par bu'i cho ga ma rdzogs kyi bar du'o/_/mthun pa'i dam rdzas zhes bya ba ni dug gi la du la brten pa'i gtor mar bya'o/_/rnal 'byor mtshan ma thob pa yis/_/zhes bya ba ni sngon du thun mong gi bsnyen pa rdzogs pa'i phyir ro/_/par bu nye bar sgrub pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/cho ga

[\[201b.1\]]brtsam par bya ba ni shin tu mthun pa bzhis sam/_yang na rnal 'byor pa gcig gis go rims kyi cho ga shes par bya'o/_/bka' stsal zhes bya ba ni mdun bskyed kyi nye bar sgrub pa rgyas par bshad pa'o/_/nag pos gsol pa zhes bya ba ni kha sbyor gyi cho ga la 'jug par bya ba zhus pa'o/_/bcom
[\[201b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das gdug pa 'dul ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'o/_/par bu nag po chen por bskyed/_/ces bya ba ni/_sngon du rnal 'byor bdag nyid ni/_/lha yi 'khor lo rdzogs par bya/_/de nas thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis/_/
[\[201b.3\]]dkyil 'khor 'khor lo spyan drangs te/_/par bu'i gnas su dmigs nas ni/_/thugs ka nas sprul nag po yi/_/mchod dang sdig pa bshags sogs bya/_/gtso bo'i thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis/_/tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi ldan par bya/_/mdun gyi dkyil 'khor gtso bo yi/_/thugs

[\[201b.7\]]ni/_/gtso bo nag po chen por bskyed/_/rab tu 'jigs byed ma la sogs/_/zur gsum du ni bskyed par bya/_/sku mdog nag mo cher 'jigs ma/_/gri gug thod pa 'dzin pa ste/_/spyan gsum sdang mig mche ba gtsigs/_/de yi lto bar gnas pa ni/_/zhes bya ba ni/_gtso bo'i lto bar
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]gnas pa ste/_/de yang bskyed par bya ba ste/_/par bu kha sbyor rim pa gsum/_/zhes bya ba ni de yang /_par bu'i 'khor lo'i gnas dang bzhi'o/_/kha sbyor ni g.yas skor dang g.yon skor du gnas pa'i phyir ro/_/gsum zhes bya ba ni dbyibs dang /_gsang ba dang stobs kyi par

[\[202a.3\]]'khor lo rtsibs brgyad gnas pa'o/_/sngags ni mar me lta bur mtshungs/_/gsung gi par bu'i bdag nyid de/_/e yi rnam pa las skyes pa'i/_/gru gsum stobs kyi par bu bshad/_/steng dang 'og gi phyogs dag tu/_/gri gug thod pa'i bdag nyid can/_/bsgrub bya myur du gsod pa

[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]thugs ka'i 'od zer ni/_/lcags kyu zhags pa'i tshul du spro/_/zhes bya'o/_/bsgrub bya gsal bar dmigs nas ni/_/gnas lngar lcags kyu zhugs nas ni/_/zhags pas yan lag bcing bya ste/_/bkug nas bka' sdod lto bar bstim/_/de ltar dgug pa'i sbyor ba ni/_/rnal 'byor bsam
[\[202b.2\]]gtan gcig pas ni/_/rgyun mi 'chad par zhes bya'o/_/bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni thams cad du sngon du 'gro ba'i tshig ste go sla'o/_/drag po'i bsam gtan ldan gyur nas/_/zhes bya ba ni/_de nas rnal 'byor dbang phyug gi_/thugs kar lha yi 'khor lo ni/_/me yi
[\[202b.3\]]dbus su gnas par bsam/_/de yi thugs ka'i 'od zer ni/_/gri gug phreng ba ltar spros te/_/bsgrub bya'i lus ni thams cad la/_/gri gug 'khor lo 'khor ba'i phyir/_/drag po bsam gtan zhes bya'o/_/gri gug thod pa thogs zhes bya ba nas/_bsam gtan sngags kyis gsad par bya/_/

[\[207a.1\]]yang na 'khor lo gnas su gzhag_/rang gi lus su brten par bya/_/zhes bya ba ni/_gong du bstan pa'i 'khor lo de/_/thod pa kha sbyor nang du ni/_/ling+ga dang bcas gzhag par bya/_/ji srid ma grub bar du ni/_/gsad pa'i cho ga bya ba'i phyir/_/lus la brten zhes bya ba'o/_/
[\[207a.2\]]bsam gtan dang ldan par bya zhes bya ba ni lha bcu bdun gyi rnal 'byor dang de'i sngags dang ldan pa'o/_/gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o/_/oM gyi dang po dang hUM gi mtha' can ni gnad la bor ba'o/_/bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i 'khor lo bsdus te bstan pa'o/_/de nas
[\[207a.3\]]zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo'i cho ga la gzhan zhus pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/zhes bya ba ni klu 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi 'khor la zhus pa'o/_/dur khrod kyi g.yam pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o/_/dur khrod snag tsha zhes bya ba ni/_dur khrod ma rungs dbus su ni/_/bdud rtsi
[\[207a.4\]]maN+Dal byas nas kyang /_/thod rlon sgyed bu gzugs par bya/_/de yi steng du mar me ni/_/dur khrod ras la bdud rtsi yi/_/snying po byas nas mar me ni/_/mar nag chen po sbar bar bya/_/thod pa dum bu gcig pa la/_/pad+ma 'dab brgyad bris nas ni/_/dbus su nang gi snying po bkod/_/
[\[207a.5\]]de nas pad+ma'i 'dab ma la/_/phyi yi snying po dgod par bya/_/de nas bar ma'i mu khyud la/_/rtsa ba'i sngags ni dgod par bya/_/de nas mar me thog tu gzhag_/lha yi 'khor lo rdzogs byas la/_/de nas thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis/_/mar me rang bzhin med byas la/_/der ni nag po chen po
[\[207a.6\]]yi/_/cho ga lnga yis bskyed par bya/_/de yi lto bar gnas pa ni/_/bka' sdod cho ga gsum gyis bskyed/_/de nas thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis/_/ye shes dgug gzhug la sogs pa'i/_/yan lag cho ga thams cad bya/_/thugs kar pad+ma nyi ma la/_/gri gug yu bar nyi ma la/_/
[\[207a.7\]]hUM las nang gi snying por ni/_/bskor te thugs ka nas spros pas/_/steng gi 'khor lo thim par bsam/_/de ltar bzlas pa stong phrag gcig_/byas nas snag tsha bsdu bar bya/_/bsam gtan sngags dang ldan gyur pas/_/zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan par bya'o/_/nag
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]po sbrul dang ldan par bskyed/_/ces bya ba ni/_gtso bo'i thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis/_/'khor lo rang bzhin med par bya/_/der ni nag po chen po dang /_/gong du bstan pa'i lha mo gsum/_/klu rnams cho ga gsum gyis bskyed/_/klu ni yi ge phuHlas so/_/de yi thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis/_/
[\[207b.2\]]rang bzhin spyan drangs dkyil 'khor bstim/_/bde gshegs dbang bskur byas nas ni/_/de nas phyi yi snying po yis/_/kun gyi thugs kar thim par bya/_/mchod pa zhes bya ba ni go sla'o/_/sngags kyi bzlas pa zhes bya ba ni nang gi snying po dang bcas pa ste/_yi ge oM gyi dang po dang /_/
[\[207b.3\]]hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA'i mtha' can no/_/gtso bo'i thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis/_/'khor lo kun la khyab par bya/_/des ni char ni 'bebs par 'gyur/_/zhes bya'o/_/gal te zhes bya ba ni ma phebs na spogs pa'i cho ga ste go sla'o/_/'khor lo bzlog ces bya ba ni klu la sogs pa bzlog pa
[\[207b.4\]]bri'o/_/steng du sbyin sreg ces bya ba ni gsang ba'i sbyin sreg ste de yang gong gi lha mo dang /_sku mdog phyag mtshan mthun par bskyed/_/sngags bzlog ces bya ba ni swA hA nas bya'o/_/bsgrub bya zhes bya ba ni go sla'o/_/de nas gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni ser ba srung ba'i 'khor lo'i bya ba la
[\[207b.5\]]'jug pa ste/_kha Ti kha yis 'khor lo bri/_/zhes bya ba ni/_bdud rtsis phyi nas byugs nas ni/_/'khor lo dbus su gru bzhi ste/_/de ni bsrung ba'i yul ming bri/_/zur bzhi sna tshogs rdo rje ni/_/rtse mor hUM dang ldan par bya/_/de yi phyi rol gru bzhir dgod/_/rdo rje bzhi yi bar khyams
[\[207b.6\]]su/_/srung ba'i sngags ni bri bar bya/_/phyi rol phyogs ni bzhi rnams la/_/sna tshogs rdo rje bri ba ste/_/dbus su hUM gi snying po ldan/_/phyi rol mu khyud zlum po la/_/rtsa ba'i sngags ni bri bar bya/_/'khor lo maN+Dal steng bzhag nas/_/bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor ni/_/dang po rdzogs par byas
[\[207b.7\]]nas ni/_/gtso bo'i thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis/_/'khor lo rang bzhin med byas nas/_/der ni lha yi 'khor lo ni/_/lha mo gsum dang bcas pa ste/_/cho ga gsum gyis rdzogs par bskyed/_/de nas thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis/_/ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs bstim/_/bde gshegs
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]dbang bskur la sogs pa'i/_/yan lag cho ga thams cad bya/_/de nas gtso bo'i lto ba ni/_/hUM gnyis bar du bsam bya ste/_/de yongs gyur pas rdo rje yi/_/srung ba'i 'khor los bsrung bar bya/_/de yi dbus su bsrung bya yi/_/yul ni legs par bsam par bya/_/de nas bzlas pa
[\[208a.2\]]bya ba ste/_/yul dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/_/sngags ni oM gyi dang po dang /_/hUM hUM phaT kyi mtha' can no/_/phyogs bzhir gzhag par bya ba ni/_/gang zhig bsrung bya'i yul du ni/_/phyogs bzhir gong gi cho ga bya/_/de nas gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni dzam+b+ha la bsgrub pa la 'jug par bya'o/_/gsal bar
[\[208a.3\]]bskyed ces bya ba ni/_lha mo dang bcas 'khor lo ni/_/cho ga gsum gyis rdzogs par bskyed/_/sngags ni oM gyi dang po dang /_/swA hA'i mtha' can te/_chu sbyin dang bsnyen pa'i cho gar shes par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to/_/zhes bya ba ni yan lag gi 'khor lo 'khor la bsdus
[\[208a.4\]]te bshad pa'o/_/'khor lo'i le'u zhes bya ba ni gsad pa'i las grub par bstan pa ste de bsdus pa'i le'u'o/_/'khor lo'i le'u'i bshad pa ste drug pa'o//_//de nas zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo'i las kyi kha bskang bar bya ba dang /_mnan pa 'ba' zhig gis gsad pa'i phyir zhus pa ste go sla'o/_/
[\[208a.5\]]bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni mnan pa'i khyad par gsungs pa'o/_/de nas zhes bya ba ni mnan pa'i bsgrub par byas pa la 'jug pa bsdus pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/zhes bya ba ni stobs chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs zhes bya ba'i don to/_/dur khrod ces bya ba ni dur khrod la
[\[208a.6\]]sogs pa'i gnas brgyad du'o/_/ting nge 'dzin dang ldan par gyur nas zhes bya ba ni sngon du bsnyen pa rdzogs pa'o/_/bsam gtan zhes bya ba ni thugs ka'i gri gug 'od zer ro/_/sngags zhes bya ba ni badzra ka pa tsi'i sngags so/_/mtshams bcad pa zhes bya ba ni srung ba'i 'khor lo'o/_/thod pa
[\[208a.7\]]zhes bya ba ni go sla'o/_/'khor lo bri zhes bya ba ni thod pa'i nang du sna tshogs rdo rje bri bar bya'o/_/rdo rje dbus kyi lte ba la nang gi snying po bri bar bya'o/_/rdo rje ra yi dbus ma la/_/'khor lo'i sngags ni dgod par bya/_/phyogs bzhi legs par bri bar bya/_/de yi phyi rol mu khyud la/_/gsad pa'i sngags
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]ni dgod par bya/_/de yang thod pa gnyis la ni/_/lugs dang lugs min bri bar bya/_/ming dang yi ge ldan par bri/_/zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya'i gzugs bri ba ste/_snying ga la sogs gnas lngar ni/_/bsgrub bya'i ming gi yi ge ni/_/hUM gi bar du ldan par bya/_/'khor lo'i nang du gzhug ces bya ba ni go
[\[208b.2\]]sla'o/_/phyi rol dur khrod ras kyis gtum/_/zhes bya ba ni dur khrod nas byung ba'i srad bus rgya gram du bcings pa'o/_/mched pa'i sa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o/_/bskyed pa'i rim pa tshul bzhin zhes bya ba ni/_dang por bdag nyid rnal 'byor ni/_/lha yi 'khor lo rdzogs par bya/_/de yi
[\[208b.3\]]thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis/_/'khor lo gnas pa'i sku gzugs la/_/phog nas rang bzhin med par bya/_/de ni lha yi 'khor lo ni/_/cho ga gsum gyis bskyed par bya/_/shin tu 'joms ma la sogs pa'i/_/mkha' 'gro gsum ni bskyed par bya/_/sku mdog nag po cher 'jigs ma/_/gri
[\[208b.4\]]gug thod pa 'dzin pa ste/_/zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum 'jigs/_/de nas thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis/_/ye shes 'khor lo bstim pa'i phyir/_/bla ma zhes bya la sogs pa'i/_/bde gshegs spyan drangs dbang bskur nas/_/thugs ka'i bdag pos rgyas gdab bya/_/de nas
[\[208b.5\]]thugs ka'i 'od zer ni/_/phyi yi snying po rab spros te/_/lha rnams so so'i thugs kar thim/_/de nas mchod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o/_/sngags kyi bzlas pa zhes bya ba ni dam tshig dang ldan par byas te/_nang gi snying po la bsnyen pa bskyal ba'o/_/thugs ka'i 'od zer zhes bya ba
[\[208b.6\]]ni gtso bo la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi thugs ka nas spros pa'o/_/bsgrub bya gsal zhes bya ba ni srog skyob pa'i lha dang bral bar gsal ba'i phyir ro/_/sngags dang zhes bya ba ni dgug pa'i sngags so/_/gri gug thod pa thogs pa zhes bya ba ni gsad pa'i sbyor ba la 'jug par bya ba gsad pa'i sngags
[\[208b.7\]]so/_/thun mtshams zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o/_/dur khrod dbus su zhes bya ba ni me thab kyi dbus su brkos te tsha ba'i rdzas kyis byug par bya'o/_/mdun gyi zhes bya ba ni de'i dbus so/_/dur khrod kyi pha gu la 'khor lo bri zhes bya ba ni/_dbus su sna tshogs rdo rje la/_/phyi rol 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bya/_/
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba la/_/nang gi snying po dgod par bya/_/rdo rje ra yi snying po la/_/phyi yi snying po bri bar bya/_/de nas 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la/_/yi ge oM gyi dang po dang /_/hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA yi/_/mtha' can rim par dgod par bya/_/de nas 'khor lo'i steng du ni/_/gang du lha yi 'khor lo
[\[209a.2\]]bskyed/_/ye shes spyan drangs la sogs pa'i/_/yan lag cho ga rdzogs par bya/_/de ni gsad pa'i sbyin sreg bya/_/mnan pas gsad pa zhes bya ba ni gsad pa 'ba' zhig tu gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/zhes bya ba ni mnan pa'i don 'khor gyi tshogs la bshad
[\[209a.3\]]pa'i don 'ba' zhig ston pa'i le'u'o/_/mnan pa'i le'u'i bshad pa ste bdun pa'o//_//de nas zhes bya ba ni las thams cad kyi sbyor ka la 'jug pa ste sbyin sreg gi las la 'jug pa zhus pa'o/_/sbyin sreg gi las zhus pa ste go sla'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/zhes bya ba ni sbyin
[\[209a.4\]]sreg gi khyad par bstan pa'o/_/de nas zhes bya ba ni sbyin sreg la 'jug par bya zhes pa'o/_/de yang gsungs pa khyad par bdun zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mdor bstan pa ni go sla'o/_/de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rgyas par zhus pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/zhes bya ba ni
[\[209a.5\]]bdag nyid chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs zhes bya ba'i don to/_/dang por bdag nyid ces bya ba ni mchod pa la sogs pa ste stong pa nyid kyi bar du tshogs bsags par bya'o/_/srung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom pa zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid las/_raM las byung ba'i nyi ma dang /_/hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje

[\[209a.7\]]ni cho ga lngas gtso bo bskyed pa ste go sla'o/_/mdun gyi nag po chen po yang /_/zhes bya ba ni bka' sdod kyi 'khor lo bskyed pa ste de yang cho ga gsum gyis bskyed pa'o/_/bka' sdod lha yi 'khor lo ni/_/mi yi dbus su gnas pa ste/_/pad+ma'i dbang phyug la sogs gsum/_/sku mdog dmar mo
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]me ltar 'bar/_/zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum pa/_/me thab thod pa gnas pa ste/_/brkyang bskum ro yi steng na 'gying /_/gtso bo'i thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis/_/ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs bstim/_/bde gshegs spyan drangs dbang bskur nas/_/rigs kyi bdag pos rgyas gdab
[\[209b.2\]]bya/_/de nas thugs ka'i 'od zer ni/_/phyi yi snying po rab spros te/_/lha rnams thugs kar thim par bya/_/mchod pa gtor ma dam tshig gi_/cho ga rim pas byas nas kyang /_/gnyis med thugs kar zhes bya ba ni nang gi snying po la bsnyen pa bya'o/_/de nas sbyin sreg brtsam par bya/_/
[\[209b.3\]]zhes bya ba ni sbyin sreg gi las la 'jug par bya ba ste/_de yang ring du spangs pa'i don ni skye bo rmongs par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/'dir shes par bya ba ni rdzas kyi cho ga ste sngon du 'gro ba'o/_/ling+ga rdzas kyi cho ga sngon du 'gro ba'o/_/de yang rkang rjes sa zhes bya ba la sogs par tshogs par byas
[\[209b.4\]]la rgyu sta gon la gnas pa'i cho ga byas te/_de nas ling+ga byas la/_bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor rdzogs par bya ste/_mgo lus tsha ba'i rdzas kyis byug_/ces bya ba ni/_ske tshe dang /_nyungs kar dang /_btsan dug gis gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis su bsnun pa'o/_/bsgrub bya
[\[209b.5\]]bkug la bstim zhes bya ba ni/_gtso bo dang bka' sdod kyi 'khor gyi thugs ka nas zhags pa dang lcags kyu'i sbyor bas bsgrub bya dgug par bya'o/_/dbye ba'i cho ga zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi le'u ru shes par bya'o/_/mgo nas rkang pa'i mthil gyi bar/_/zhes bya ba ni thig le'i gnas sum cu rtsa
[\[209b.6\]]gnyis so/_/gsang sngags zhes bya ba ni gtso bo dang bka' sdod kyi thugs ka nas spros pa'o/_/tsher ma zhes bya ba ni ni raM su'i phur bu la sogs pa'o/_/'bum phrag ces bya ba ni sngags kyi grangs so/_/de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o/_/dgang gzar blugs gzar zhes bya ba ni nyi ma'i
[\[209b.7\]]steng du oM dang hUM gis mtshan pa'o/_/yam shing dug gi rigs las byung ba'i shing la tsha ba'i rdzas kyis byugs shing re phas mtshan pa'o/_/nyungs mar la sogs pa'i bdud rtsi lngas bsang gtor bya zhing rtsa ba'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab pa'o/_/gzhan yang mchod pa dang gtor ma la sogs pa yang
